string.text: {=06e8ea79}Error 001: Could not serialize Settings.xml: {ERR} Using default values!

{=faAd84dA}Distinguished Service loaded successfully
Using Modules/DistServervice110 Settings
{=A7124477}At maximum allowed companions. No nominations possible.
{=D7F07C09}Max nominations = {MAX}{NEWLINE}Tier Threshold = {TTHRESH}{NEWLINE}Kill Thresh.:{NEWLINE}Inf = {KTHRESH} cav = {CTHRESH} ran = {RTHRESH}{NEWLINE}Performance Thresh. = {PTHRESH}
{=04d2faC3}MLBW compatibility mode:{NEWLINE}Using first equipment sets
{=1cD516bA}CAUTION 005: Troops will auto-promote to heros at tier {TTHRESH}{NEWLINE}Change settings if this is unintended.

{=4EE768a2}CAUTION 007: Ignoring companion limit.
{=8bB978c1}CAUTION 009: No wanderer template with culture {CULTURE} available.{NEWLINE} Choosing randomly instead
{=243961af}CAUTION 013: Something went wrong with this unit's equipment.{NEWLINE}Aborting process, not everything might be added properly.
{=13cc35c2}CAUTION 014: Reflection call to CheckInitialLevel failed. Potential version issue.
{=cc29D94D}CAUTION 015: Something went wrong with this unit's equipment.{NEWLINE}Aborting process, not everything might be added properly.
{=fa7BFEaB}WARNING 010: SOMETHING ACTUALLY WENT WRONG WITH WANDERER TEMPLATES{NEWLINE}PICKING COMPLETELY RANDOMLY
{=71a98d3e}WARNING 011: Could not find valid wanderer template. You broke something.
{=E773C408}Equipment format issue, providing default equipment instead! Exception details:{NEWLINE}{TEXT}
{=c0A99490}Well, uh, I guess it beats prison...
{=FdE08029}If it means I don't get chained up, it sounds good to me!
{=DfBbA844}Deal - I never liked the other guy anyway.
{=fe8aa69D}Deal. Working with you seems like the safest bet.
{=9a73CFbd}I like your proposition! We shall face more glorious battle together!
{=D1C118bd}Uh... Sure, why not.
{=15373806}I just can't accept!
{=ba850ec7}I can't just join with whoever's most convenient! The whole system would fall apart!
{=7c298cC9}I would never betray my commander like that!
{=77E91d9d}No - I won't throw my life away for somebody who hasn't earned it.
{=72376ce2}I just want to retire after this! No deal!
{=136b0505}{COUNT} kills
{=98C9ea02}Round {COUNT}
{=00BaAdfA}{NAME} got {COUNT}

sting.text: Sold loot in the black market
Bought and sold items from towns you visited
Helped construct and take down the camp
I want you to be known by another name...
Take these companions into your party...
I wish to reassign heroes in your party...
After this defeat, are you sure you wouldn't rather work for me?

string.text: {=1f94d05e}Transfer Heroes
{=3A704181}You can select who to assign to {HERO}'s party
{=a62e65a5}Distinguished Soldiers
{=1A63b476}Several soldiers made names for themselves in this battle. You can choose up to {N} (or none, by exiting) to fight at your side as a companion.
{=f8DAbCe9}Console Command
{=2D5Ca02e}Pick a soldier to uplift!
